# Monte Carlo Integration and Variance Reduction

## 5.14

Use importance sampling to obtain a Monte Carlo estimate of: 

$$g(X) = \int_{1}^{\infty} \frac{x^2}{\sqrt{2\pi}} e^{-x^2/2} dx$$

### MC Estimate

```{r}
m <- 10^4
u <- runif(m, 1, 5)
g <- function(x) {(x^2/sqrt(2*pi)) * exp(-(x^2)/2) } 
```


```{r}
mean(g(u))

integrate(g, 1, Inf)
curve(g, -5, 5)
```
